skills.name: Martial Poise
skills.blurb: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kalista's''' {{tip|basic attack}} has unique properties:
* Deals {{as|90% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}.
* Does not deal [[damage]] nor trigger {{tip|on-hit}} effects if '''Kalista''' loses {{tip|sight}} of the target before it hits.
* Has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, though can be cancelled by using {{ai|Rend|Kalista}}.
* '''Kalista''' can switch targets during its windup.
* Has its windup reduced by only {{fd|0.75}}% per {{sti|as|{{tt|{{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}|Compared to the standard 1% per 1%}}}}. 
* Makes '''Kalista''' {{tip|dash}} in the target direction after issuing a movement command during its windup or right after casting {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}.
** The distance increases based on the direction (in regards to her facing direction) she is dashing into, whether she has {{tt|Tier 2|Finished Boots item}} {{ig|Boots}} and is entirely different from {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}.
** '''''Kalista''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during the dash.''
{{sbc|Innate - Oathsworn Bond:}} '''Kalista''' begins the game with an exclusive {{ii|Black Spear}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kalista's basic attack has unique properties: * Deals 90% AD physical damage. * Does not deal damage nor trigger on-hit effects if Kalista loses sight of the target before it hits. * Has an uncancelable windup, though can be cancelled by using Kalista's Rend. * Kalista can switch targets during its windup. * Has its windup reduced by only 0.75% per 1% bonus attack speed. * Makes Kalista dash in the target direction after issuing a movement command during its windup or right after casting Kalista's Pierce. ** The distance increases based on the direction (in regards to her facing direction) she is dashing into, whether she has Tier 2 Unknown value: ig / Boots and is entirely different from Kalista's Pierce. ** Kalista will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
Innate - Oathsworn Bond: Kalista begins the game with an exclusive The item: Black Spear.
skills.notes:
* '''Kalista''' shares having an unusual basic attack windup modifier with a few other champions.
** See [[List of champions/Basic attacks]] for a list.
* '''Kalista''' also has the longest relative basic attack windup time of all champions, however this is offset by her high base attack speed and attack speed scaling.
* The dash speed depends on '''Kalista's''' {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}.
* The dash speed is affected by {{as|{{stil|multiplicative movement speed modifiers}}}} such as {{tip|slow|slows}}.
** {{as|{{sti|movement speed|Additive movement speed modifiers}}|movement speed}} do not affect it.
* There are a total of 24 different dash ranges based on direction, Boots and {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} being cast
* '''Kalista''' will attempt to attack her target again at the end of the dash, allowing the player to kite with only movement commands as long as they remain in attack range.
* Attack move click checks for targets in brief intervals, but only while '''Kalista''' is not in a dash, resulting in lost DPS if it is used to automatically dash.
<!-- Kalista's facing direction after the dash is the direction of her attack. Pending test: reaction to with Tryndamere's  Mocking Shout and Cassiopeia's Petrifying Gaze during the dash. -->

skills.name: Pierce
skills.blurb: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' hurls a spear in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit.

If ''Pierce'' kills the target, the spear continues onward to transfer all of the target's {{ai|Rend|Kalista}} stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum range.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kalista hurls a spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.
If Pierce kills the target, the spear continues onward to transfer all of the target's Kalista's Rend stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum range.
skills.notes: * ''Pierce'' will fire from wherever '''Kalista''' is at the end of the cast time.

skills.name: Sentinel
skills.blurb: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Soul-Marked:}} While '''Kalista''' and her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} are {{tip|tether|tethered}}, their basic attacks and {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} apply a ''Soul-Mark'' to their targets.

If both ''Soul-Marks'' are applied to the same target within 4 seconds, they take {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped against non-champions, and cannot be ''Soul-Marked'' again for a few seconds. ''Soul-Mark'' deals a minimum of 75 damage to {{tip|minions}} and executes them if they're below {{as|{{sti|health|125 health}}}}. '''Kalista''' applies the damage {{tip|on-attack}} while the ''Oathsworn'' does so {{tip|on-hit}}.
{{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kalista''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Sentinel'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' summons a ''Sentinel'' that moves forward in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area along its path.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Soul-Marked: While Kalista and her The item: The Black Spear are tethered, their basic attacks and Kalista's Pierce apply a Soul-Mark to their targets.
If both Soul-Marks are applied to the same target within 4 seconds, they take bonus magic damage, capped against non-champions, and cannot be Soul-Marked again for a few seconds. Soul-Mark deals a minimum of 75 damage to minions and executes them if they're below 125 health. Kalista applies the damage on-attack while the Oathsworn does so on-hit.
Passive: Kalista periodically stocks a Sentinel charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Active: Kalista summons a Sentinel that moves forward in the target direction, granting sight of the area along its path.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|14 to 18}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage is credited to '''Kalista''' and will benefit from both her {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic penetration}}}} and [[spell effects]].
** If her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} ally scores a kill using ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage they will get a message stating 'Kill Secured' in place of the usual gold pop-up (the gold itself is credited to '''Kalista''').
* The ''Sentinel's'' {{tip|sight}} reveal on enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} is accredited for [[assist|assists]] and potentially [[kill|kills]] (if they die shortly after being spotted).
** It does not reveal {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} targets.
* ''Sentinel'' will cast from wherever '''Kalista''' is at the end of the cast time.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Soul Mark's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* {{pending for test}} If ''Pierce'' kills the target by ''Soul-Mark's'' additional damage, it will/will not continue.

effects.str:
• Bonus Magic Damage: % of target's maximum health
  • Maximum Non-Champion Damage:

skills.name: Rend
skills.blurb: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kalista's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} and {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} lodge a spear into their target, applying a ''Rend'' [[stack]] for 4 seconds, which stacks up to 254 times. The duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and hits of {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' rips all lodged spears from valid nearby enemies, consuming all of their stacks to deal them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow}} them for 2 seconds. Each additional spear on the target deals reduced damage. ''Rend'' deals 50% reduced damage against epic {{tip|monsters}}.
''Rend'' resets its {{sti|cooldown}} and restores {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} if it [[kill]]s at least one target.
''A nearby enemy with a Rend stack is required to cast this ability.''

''Rend'' can be used during the dash of {{ai|Martial Poise|Kalista}} and the cast time of {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}. In-flight spears and {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} if in cast will be empowered to apply ''Rend's'' effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger ''Rend's'' refund.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kalista's basic attacks on-hit and Kalista's Pierce lodge a spear into their target, applying a Rend stack for 4 seconds, which stacks up to 254 times. The duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and hits of Kalista's Pierce.
Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from valid nearby enemies, consuming all of their stacks to deal them physical damage and slow them for 2 seconds. Each additional spear on the target deals reduced damage. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic monsters.
Rend resets its cooldown and restores mana if it kills at least one target.
A nearby enemy with a Rend stack is required to cast this ability.
Rend can be used during the dash of Kalista's Martial Poise and the cast time of Kalista's Pierce. In-flight spears and Kalista's Pierce if in cast will be empowered to apply Rend's effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger Rend's refund.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Damage per Additional Spear|{{ap|10 to 34}} {{as|(+ {{ap|19.8|23.748|27.498|31.248|34.988}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|10 to 42}}%}}
skills.notes:
* ''Rend'' at maximum stacks will deal a total of {{as|{{ap|(20 to 60)+(10+3*(x-1)+x*(x-1)/2)*253}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60*(1+0.33*253)|60*(1+0.3958*253) to 60*(1+0.5833*253) 4}}% AD)}} {{as|physical damage}}.
* ''Rend'' cannot activate on {{tip|untargetable}} enemies.
* ''Rend'' applies its effects instantly on cast.
* The cooldown will not reset if the target is protected by {{tip|resurrection}} effects.
* If ''Rend'' is used against {{ci|Sion}} under the effects of {{ai|Glory in Death|Sion}}, the cooldown will reset even if it does not kill him.
* A stack is not applied if the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}} or missed while '''Kalista''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. 
* {{Pending for test}}: {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} does not apply a stack of ''Rend'' if blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% AD)
  • Damage per Additional Spear: (+ % AD)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Fate's Call
skills.blurb: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. The ally gains the ability to launch toward a location, knocking enemy champions back.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' invokes her {{ii|The Black Spear|tether}} to retrieve her ''Oathsworn'', pulling them to her over 1 second and {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} them from all {{tip|crowd control}}. The ''Oathsworn'' is rendered {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invulnerable}} for up to 4 seconds, during which they are held by '''Kalista'''.

The ''Oathsworn'' can {{tip|dash}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to a target location during this time, and automatically does so in front of '''Kalista''' at the end of the duration, ending ''Fate's Call's'' effects. The dash will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all surrounding enemies for a duration and landing the ''Oathsworn'' at their {{sti|attack range|basic attack range}} relative to the target collided with.

''The Oathsworn must be nearby to cast this ability. The Oathsworn {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} upon retrieval until dash completion, and is also {{tip|silence|silenced}} and unable to perform movement or attack commands during the entire effect.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kalista invokes her The item: The Black Spear to retrieve her Oathsworn, pulling them to her over 1 second and cleansing them from all crowd control. The Oathsworn is rendered untargetable and invulnerable for up to 4 seconds, during which they are held by Kalista.
The Oathsworn can dash with displacement immunity to a target location during this time, and automatically does so in front of Kalista at the end of the duration, ending Fate's Call's effects. The dash will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking up all surrounding enemies for a duration and landing the Oathsworn at their basic attack range relative to the target collided with.
The Oathsworn must be nearby to cast this ability. The Oathsworn vanishes upon retrieval until dash completion, and is also silenced and unable to perform movement or attack commands during the entire effect.
skills.notes:
* The following will defer ''Fate's Call's'' effects at the time of cast to the end of ''their duration'' if the ''Oathsworn'' is:
** In a [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]].
** {{tip|Channel|Channeling}}.
*** ''Fate's Call'' will not defer by the following channels: {{si|Recall}}, {{ai|Abyssal Voyage|Tahm Kench}} (first channel), {{ai|Defiant Dance|Irelia}}, {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}, and {{ai|The Culling|Lucian}}.
*** ''Fate's Call'' cannot be cast during the following channels: {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Abyssal Voyage|Tahm Kench}} (second channel), {{ai|Gate|Twisted Fate}}, {{ai|Grand Starfall|Pantheon}}, {{ai|Hero's Entrance|Galio}} and {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}.
** {{tip|Displacement immune}}.
** Performing {{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}}, {{ai|Stormbringer|Volibear}}, {{ai|The Darkin Scythe|Kayn|Transformation}}, or {{ai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}}. {{tt|*|These abilities are special cased to not be invoked. This is not complete, others are pending for test.}}
* ''Fate's Call'' will not pull the ''Oathsworn'' if they are {{tip|dash|dashing}} but they will be retrieved after 1 second regardless.
* ''Fate's Call'' will pull the ''Oathsworn'' even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Fate's Call'' is disabled if the ''Oathsworn'' is {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}} or is being affected by another ''Fate's Call''.
* ''Fate's Call'' can be used even if the ''Oathsworn'' is in a {{tip|zombie state}}.
* The ''Oathsworn'' being held is represented by a light over '''Kalista's''' head.
* '''Kalista's''' [[death]] does not cancel ''Fate's Call''.
